text:

```" Use completion-nvim in every buffer
autocmd BufEnter * lua require'completion'.on_attach()```

text:
relevant lines here
```autocmd BufEnter * lua require'completion'.on_attach()
let g:completion_enable_snippet = 'UltiSnips'
let g:completion_enable_auto_popup = 1
au Filetype lua setl omnifunc=v:lua.vim.lsp.omnifunc
nnoremap <Leader>ct :CompletionToggle<CR>
let g:completion_auto_change_source = 1
let g:completion_matching_strategy_list = ['exact', 'substring', 'fuzzy', 'all']```

elements.text: relevant lines here

autocmd BufEnter * lua require'completion'.on_attach()
let g:completion_enable_snippet = 'UltiSnips'
let g:completion_enable_auto_popup = 1
au Filetype lua setl omnifunc=v:lua.vim.lsp.omnifunc
nnoremap <Leader>ct :CompletionToggle<CR>
let g:completion_auto_change_source = 1
let g:completion_matching_strategy_list = ['exact', 'substring', 'fuzzy', 'all']

text: Now I remember that at some point, the autocompletion was clashing with ultisnips.

elements.text: Now I remember that at some point, the autocompletion was clashing with ultisnips.

text:
So I had to define the following:
```" Assign dummy keys (expand trigger and list snippets are taken care of by completion-nvim)
let g:UltiSnipsExpandTrigger       = "<\>"
let g:UltiSnipsListSnippets        = "<\>"```

elements.text: So I had to define the following:

" Assign dummy keys (expand trigger and list snippets are taken care of by completion-nvim)
let g:UltiSnipsExpandTrigger       = "<\>"
let g:UltiSnipsListSnippets        = "<\>"

text: Could it be that this is hampering you as well?

elements.text: Could it be that this is hampering you as well?

text:
And also make sure that you are not overwriting mappings with ultisnip's go to next/prev key mappings.. I have the following:
```let g:UltiSnipsJumpForwardTrigger  = "<C-j>"
let g:UltiSnipsJumpBackwardTrigger = "<C-k>"```
In other words, no Tabs in there.;

elements.text: And also make sure that you are not overwriting mappings with ultisnip's go to next/prev key mappings.. I have the following:

let g:UltiSnipsJumpForwardTrigger  = "<C-j>"
let g:UltiSnipsJumpBackwardTrigger = "<C-k>"
In other words, no Tabs in there.;
